name: tempsdarret-studio
description: Photographer portfolio website with client portal - Temps D'arrÃªt Studio
author: romdj

scripts.build:tmp: echo 'This is a temporary build script'
scripts.build: npm run build:models && npm run build:shared && npm run build:services && npm run build:api-gateway && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: npm run build:user-service && npm run build:invite-service && npm run build:portfolio-service && npm run build:shoot-service && npm run build:file-service && npm run build:notification-service
scripts.install:workspaces: npm run install:shared && npm run install:services && npm run install:api-gateway && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:dev-tools
scripts.install:services: npm run install:user-service && npm run install:invite-service && npm run install:portfolio-service && npm run install:shoot-service && npm run install:file-service && npm run install:notification-service
scripts.dev: npm run dev:services & npm run dev:api-gateway & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.dev:services: npm run dev:user-service & npm run dev:invite-service & npm run dev:portfolio-service & npm run dev:shoot-service & npm run dev:file-service & npm run dev:notification-service
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:services && npm run test:api-gateway && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:services: npm run test:user-service && npm run test:invite-service && npm run test:portfolio-service && npm run test:shoot-service && npm run test:file-service && npm run test:notification-service
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:shared && npm run test:coverage:services && npm run test:coverage:api-gateway && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:services: npm run test:coverage:user-service && npm run test:coverage:invite-service && npm run test:coverage:portfolio-service && npm run test:coverage:shoot-service && npm run test:coverage:file-service && npm run test:coverage:notification-service
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:services && npm run lint:api-gateway && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:services: npm run lint:user-service && npm run lint:invite-service && npm run lint:portfolio-service && npm run lint:shoot-service && npm run lint:file-service && npm run lint:notification-service
scripts.check: npm run check:shared && npm run check:services && npm run check:api-gateway && npm run check:frontend
scripts.check:services: npm run check:user-service && npm run check:invite-service && npm run check:portfolio-service && npm run check:shoot-service && npm run check:file-service && npm run check:notification-service
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:services && npm run clean:api-gateway && npm run clean:frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:shared: cd packages/shared && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:services: npm run clean:user-service && npm run clean:invite-service && npm run clean:portfolio-service && npm run clean:shoot-service && npm run clean:file-service && npm run clean:notification-service
scripts.clean:user-service: cd services/user-service && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:invite-service: cd services/invite-service && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:portfolio-service: cd services/portfolio-service && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:shoot-service: cd services/shoot-service && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:file-service: cd services/file-service && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:notification-service: cd services/notification-service && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:api-gateway: cd api-gateway && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run check && npm audit --audit-level=high
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose down --rmi all -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.docs:generate: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:events && npm run docs:architecture
scripts.docs:api: cd packages/models && npm run build && npx @redocly/cli build-docs dist/openapi.json --output ../../docs/api/index.html
